verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.

tokens.t: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.

verses.plain: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

tokens.t: in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

verses.plain: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

tokens.t: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness:
gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

verses.plain: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.

tokens.t: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.

verses.plain: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.

tokens.t: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.

verses.plain: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.

tokens.t: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the

verses.plain: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

tokens.t: established, he shall not be afraid, until he see

verses.plain: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.

tokens.t: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.

verses.plain: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.

tokens.t: , and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
